trends: There has been one other sighting in Manhattan
There were no other sightings in Manhattan on or around May 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside talking with friends and noticed a strange bright light in the sky. At first it looked like a plane, but I noticed it was not moving at all, and much brighter than other planes I often see flying lower in the sky. I then saw two planes flying at the same time as this bright light that was not moving. I was facing towards the East, high in the night sky I observed a light, brighter than a plane. I knew it was strange, so I called my mom to have her view it from our balcony at home, too. It was stationary for about 5 minutes, in the last minute of visability it seemed to move upward rather quickly. Then I could no longer view it through the clouds it seemed to rise higher up into.
